Question: Dongguan Ce Link Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CE LINK Limited

CES 2024

- Dongguan CE LINK Limited, a leading electrical and electronic products manufacturer, showcased its 3000W Portable Power Station at CES 2024
- The 3000W Series features intelligent APP control, USB flash disk software upgrade, bidirectional topology, and smart UPS functionality
- Equipped with a 2560Wh lithium-ion battery, three 120V AC outlets, four USB ports, a 12V DC outlet, and a built-in LED display
- Offers AC reverse fast charging, seamless and instant power transition, and 400W Solar Power Panel PV support
- The product includes an intelligent inertial air cooling system, automatic input frequency detection, and aluminum alloy bracket for structural design
- CE LINK Limited is a trusted name in the industry, committed to excellence, quality control, and environmental protection
- The company has 4 factories and more than 10,000 employees, offering a diverse product range including cables, signal adapters, converters, docking stations, and power sockets
